name: Llama V2 13B Chat
description: Llama V2 13B Chat, developed by Meta, is an auto-regressive language model that uses an optimized transformer architecture. It's a 13B parameters finetuned Chat model version using supervised fine-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning with human feedback (RLHF) to align to human preferences for helpfulness and safety. It's released under a custom commercial license.
